class.source: def reporthook(blocknum, blocksize, totalsize): readsofar = blocknum * blocksize if totalsize > 0: percent = readsofar * 1e2 / totalsize s = "\r%5.1f%% %*d / %d" % ( percent, len(str(totalsize)), readsofar, totalsize) sys.stderr.write(s) if readsofar >= totalsize: # near the end sys.stderr.write("\n") else: # total size is unknown sys.stderr.write("read %d\n" % (readsofar,))

def reporthook(blocknum, blocksize, totalsize): readsofar = blocknum * blocksize if totalsize > 0: percent = readsofar * 1e2 / totalsize s = "\r%5.1f%% %*d / %d" % ( percent, len(str(totalsize)), readsofar, totalsize) sys.stderr.write(s) if readsofar >= totalsize: # near the end sys.stderr.write("\n") else: # total size is unknown sys.stderr.write("read %d\n" % (readsofar,))
